column2: I was attacked by this Mirage and [f2]apparently[/f] turned into a vampire.
Of course, I can’t remember any of it.
But it is [f2]really[/f] scary to think I might’ve stayed that way forever.
I’m starting to wish I was a vampire again just so I don’t have to think about it.
First, I got turned into a vampire... Then, I thought I was going to get turned into a machine.
It sure is nice to not have to worry about that stuff anymore.
